version_description: - Fixed a bug where you coudn't use the new costumes

- you can now access update 2 content
- stability fixes
- iCloud storage fix

Big Arena Upgrade !
You can now select the opponent to fight from a choice of 3 : wait 15 minutes to get a new choice or spend a doomstone to refresh the choice instantly.
You can now unlock and equip special perks that change the outcome of the battle: get a resource boost or hinder the opponent's ability to cast spells, hire a friendly v.i.p. or explosive decoys... the choice is up to you!
All the classes now have special features and elemental weaknesses to take into account in battle!
Various bugfixes, including the fix to the Arena Victory screen issue.

Yota's void resource fix,
fix to resource generation in online battles,
fix to tags in online battles,
more balancing fixes.

Keyboard should correctly re-appear on iphone 4.
Should no longer hang after casting a power on iphone 4.
Fixes for the upcoming content patch.

+ New screen to check enemy stats
+ New Title Screen
+ New Crowdsourced localization engine
+ New Fixes to summons and statuses
+ New Levelup screen
+ New Arena balance fixes
+ New Virtual Keyboard support
-Fix to online battles

- New BattleQueue and BattleMessage graphics
- Fixed crash at startup if you changed the password of the online account

- new start screen
- added achievements
- fixed a lot of bugs and solved many stability issues
Preparation update for final story release.

Now working over IpV6 connection.
Fixed action time after resurrection.
The recoil time is now dependant on the Constitution of the character being resurrected.
New Perks system to prepare the release of 25 new perks.
Fixed escape when summons are in party.
Fixed extra char not appearing in the followers.
Fixed status cancelling opposite status tokens.
Fixed some achievement not working properly.

+ New Splashscreen
+ Many minor fixes

+ New Splashscreen
+ Many minor fixes
+ Updated store page
+ Spanish language support available

- bug fixes
- multiplayer update with ranks unlocked up to rank 50

The TORTELLINI UPDATE 2.6.7.0 will amaze you with:
- Max Arena Rank 50
- 20 new Arena Perks
- 14 new wacky costumes
- Improved Arena usability (promotions arrows, perk usage icon, perks filters, quick message when attacked)
- Added Player's detail page (with Achievements, platform used and info like these)
- Improved Crowd Translation features (easier to use and works better)
- General bug fix (as usual :-* )

Added compatibility to the game data from the lite version, existing games should not be affected.
Fixed many bugs and improved stability to prepare for the content update.
Solved a bug where the audio could crash the game if too many audiofiles were played at once.
Fixed an issue where the resources will not refill correctly.
- bugfixes
- Solved occasional crashes and slow-downs

NOODLES UPDATE 2.7.5.3
- Added the Flying Ship, every corner of the world is exploable
- Level cap 149!
- Max affinity 20, for every class;
- Added a new class, the Adventurer;
- New questlines and dungeons, affinity crystals are now farmable;
- Unlocked the Ultimetal gear;
- Old bugs fixed, new ones added!
- Fixes the Hi Quality animation option
Fixed the problem of music not playing.
